description: Razorpay is India's leading full-stack financial solutions company. We help businesses accept payments, make payouts, and manage their finances.

products.name: Payment Gateway
products.details: Accept domestic and international payments with 100+ payment modes including UPI, Cards, Netbanking, and Wallets.

products.name: Payment Links
products.details: Share payment links via SMS, Email, or WhatsApp and get paid immediately without a website.

products.name: RazorpayX
products.details: A neobanking platform to supercharge your business banking. Automate payroll, pay vendors, and manage corporate cards.

pricing.standard: 2% per transaction for Indian Debit/Credit cards, Netbanking, and UPI.
pricing.enterprise: Custom pricing available for large volumes. Requires contacting the sales team.

faq.question: Is there a setup fee?
faq.answer: No, there is zero setup fee and zero annual maintenance fee for the standard plan.

faq.question: How long does settlement take?
faq.answer: Standard settlement cycle is T+2 days (2 working days after the transaction).

faq.question: Do you support subscriptions?
faq.answer: Yes, Razorpay Subscriptions allows you to automate recurring payments via UPI, Cards, and eMandate.
